mapper.select: SELECT A.subject_id,A.subject_name,A.subject_option, A.subject_solution,A.subject_answer,A.chapter_id,A.ppassport_id, A.ppassport_time,A.quetype_id,A.level_id,A.course_id,A.knopoint_id, C.tea_name,E.course_name,D.knopoint_name FROM tk_subject A,tk_teacher C,tk_knopoint D,tk_course E WHERE A.ppassport_id=C.passport_id AND A.knopoint_id=D.knopoint_id AND A.course_id=E.course_id AND A.subject_id=#{subjectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
